entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
